entry.title: Photos Post 13: Moments of Growth, New Albums and Galleries, Part 16

link.title: Photos Post 13: Moments of Growth, New Albums and Galleries, Part 16

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to bring to your attention one new art gallery Enlightened Short Prose Framed by an Artist.
Please kindly share the news and the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 12
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 Photo of the special event 1996-1027 Talk to Sahaja Yogis and School Children, Italy has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 nedium resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the Photo in the smallest gallery: Collection 1996.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 11

Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 4 Photos of the special event 1989-1212 Talk to Sahaja Yogis, New Delhi, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 3 medium resolutions and 1 low resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 4 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1989.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!
